contactMessage: I am available to work any kind of web development projects on hourly or project based. Contact me though WhatsApp or Email.

features.title: Web Design
features.desc: First and foremost, I create prototype of the project the provide my client the desire end result they are expecting.

features.title: Front-end development
features.desc: Using Vanilla JavaScript, Vue.js or React.js I create intractive user interface for best experience of the user

features.title: Back-end Development
features.desc: I create REST API or GraphQL API using modern popular frameworks Express.js, Django, Nest.js, and FastAPI. A part from that, integrate any possible third party API integration.

features.title: Server Administration
features.desc: Deplying Web Application or Static website on Linux or Windows servers. Moreover, API hosting on diffrent cloud services such as AWS Lambda, Azure functions, or Elastic Beanstack

features.title: DevOps
features.desc: For enterprise websites, CI/CD pipeline to hosting, containerization with docker, versioning code with git, kubernetes.

features.title: Mobile Application
features.desc: Create IOS and Android application with React-native.

works.title: Freelance Marketplace
works.desc: Included features are wishlist, contact, admin panel, user dashboard, email notification, file uploads to AWS S3, and many more. First and foremost, I create prototype of the project the provide my client the desire end result they are expecting. afterward I developed this from scratch and deployed on AWS EC2

works.title: Asset consulting Website
works.desc: In this website, anyone before purchasing any kinds of fixed asset customers will task advice from professional website. Included features are form submission, stripe payment, user authentication and more. Only core HTML is been used for this website fronte-end development since client wanted to keep it SEO friendly. In additon to that, Express.js rest API used to build API from scratch alogn with MongoDB Database

works.title: Financial website for saving
works.desc: Included features are user authentication, admin panel, user dashboard, multi-lingual, membership of a pack, create pack, join pack, select leader of the pack, manage pack by leager.

works.title: Cost Calculation
works.desc: This website for an agency, customer comes to this website and calculate their estimated cost of specific services they required.

works.title: Peer To Peer File sharing
works.desc: This website is used for two diffrent purpose, first and foremost, user can share file without uploading it to a server, it is peer to peer file sharing using WebRTC Technology. In addition to that, Socket.io is been used to transfer signal of WebRTC. Secondly, this website can be used to make URL of a website short.

works.title: Web Design------
works.desc: I developed a custom theme from scratch and using that theme I made my wordpress blogging site.

works.title: Ponditi Learning Platform
works.desc: Features of this website to be mentioned, Role Base JWT User Authentication, Students search teacher, Send tuotian request, create conversation, get tutorian on hourly or monthly basis, User Dashboard, admin panel, and more.

works.title: Email Template Building
works.desc: Features of this website to be mentioned, Create email template, customize template, save template, edit template, preview template, export template, upload template images to AWS S3, and more

works.title: Tournament Website
works.desc: Features of this website to be mentioned, join in a tournament, 5 rounds in the tournament, random team up in first round, points calculations, adding extra points, rank players after round 1, random team up or team up based on rankings, leave the team and join team in the middle of the tournament, show score, user authentication, admin panel, and more.

testimonial.comments: This was the best experience I have had with any freelancer. Incredibly skilled and hardworking. Extremely responsive and passionate about your project. Through this experience with him I consider him a friend and a partner more than a freelancer. 10/10 work, effort, everything. So thankful for being able to have worked with him and I plan on working with him again in the future.
Great programmer, excellent at what he does and very respectful!

testimonial.project: Front-end Development With Adobe AE Animation
testimonial.comments: Shayon is one of the most friendly freelancers I have ever met. He was very forgiving as remained out of touch for a very long time due to personal reasons. In terms of work - he turned it around very quickly and very professionally. I highly recommend Shayon to anybody looking for a web developer and designer. Thank you Shayon !

Great work on the recent project. The developer has shown a strong understanding of the programming language and technologies used, and was able to implement the required features effectively. The code is well-organized and easy to understand, making it easy for others to maintain. The developer also effectively communicated with the team and was able to meet deadlines. Overall, a valuable asset to the team and I look forward to working with him on future projects.

testimonial.project: Agency Web APP & CI/CD Hosting setup
testimonial.comments: The best developer I have worked with. He is always on top of things and was able to resolve any and every issue that may have arose, very quickly. Excellent communication and he writes extremely good code and makes beautiful work. My favorite freelancer I have worked with.
Very talented web designer, will use again, thanks for dedication.
